title: why you get leavebuster or lp lose when you /remake
body: i mean the game isnt even started no one has won or somthing so i understand why you get lp lose but why do you get leavebuster??

replies.body:
If you or someone in your premade (if Diamond+) *causes* the remake to happen, then there are penalties for doing so. Causing a remake still costs the other players time and can be frustrating under certain circumstances. Check out our [/Remake FAQ](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/208754686--Remake-FAQ) for other details on the system.

Let me know if you have any other questions.
